QuestData.Title: The Eye of Command
QuestData.CompletionText: Drek'Thar sings your praises. Kalimdor is abuzz with tales of your heroics. The Warchief glows - your stalwart defense of our clan has pleased him greatly.$B$BYou have earned the Eye of Command.$B$BPresent your insignia, Commander $N.
QuestData.RewardText: Channel the power of the insignia. Let the enemy hear your words. The might of the Horde is unquestionable!
